snippet: The president’s decision to delay until 2015 a major provision of the law was the subject of a House Ways and Means subcommittee hearing.
abstract: Congressional Democrats say that they expect to see more delays and snags in Pres Obama's efforts to implement new health care law; affirm their strong support for the overarching goal of expanded coverage.
lead_paragraph: The president’s decision to delay until 2015 a major provision of the law was the subject of a House Ways and Means subcommittee hearing.

headline.main: Democrats Shrug Off Delays and Affirm Support for Health Law
headline.print_headline: Democrats Shrug Off Delays and Affirm Support for Health Law

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
